price: 51. Diggah nanu ni-Rabbi ni-dambitte neh cabam kaak qaagitna Muusal naharak teemene moominiin nekkeemih sabbatah.
arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naṭmaʿu an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwala al-mu'minīna
